programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to stick your mid range to full swing wedge shots; learn how to make solid contact like Collin Morikawa, hit it straight down your target line like Steve Stricker and control distance like Rory McIlroy.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach drills to cure the worst swing faults; learn how to improve your swing plane like Tiger Woods, use a pool noodle to eliminate the chicken wing and fix numerous faults that cause a slice.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.sub-title: Cead Mile Failte - A Hundred Thousand Welcomes
programme.desc: Twelve aspiring golf professionals from all over the world and from many different backgrounds arrive in Ireland. The players are divided into mixed-teams where they will not only be competing as a team, but living together as well.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The competition heats up in Ireland as one team fights to stay together. Personalities clash when poor play by a captain forces their team to go to elimination.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: A competitor's life is threatened by a serious illness as the team fights to stay out of elimination; the teams are driven to the edge.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: One team's recent success is short lived as news of their fallen teammate spells potential disaster. A remarkable hole-out decides the fate of one captain, leaving the other staring elimination in the face.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Poor play by one golfer causes deep and irreparable divides within the house. A surprising decision by a captain leaves their team and fate on the brink of elimination.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The competitors take a road trip to one of Ireland's premiere links courses where the wind and two players' emotions try to blow the teams apart. Distrust and dislike forces one team to put emotions aside for the betterment of the group.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Competitors fight to remain and keep their hopes alive. Smelling blood, one team looks to eradicate the opposition.
